hi I'm Miller from AWS in this video I
will describe how you can join meetings
using your Amazon echo device this
feature is included in a box of a
business and enables you to
automatically connect to meetings from
the most popular conferencing providers
Alexa for business lets you use a
laxative voice enable your workplace by
providing the tools you need to manage
Alexa devices skills and user set skill
as well as an API to build custom
context-aware voice skills for your
organization before I'm going to explain
how you can enable this feature let's
look at the demo first to join a meeting
you can simply say Alexa join my meeting
do you want to join the meeting weekly
marketing review yes me being powered by
Amazon chime and Alexa as you can see I
joined her Amazon chai meeting that was
scheduled on my calendar to end the call
say Alexa hang up let's have a look how
you can set it up as you can see I
already created my rules and set up my
echo devices to start using your echo
devices to join meetings or make
outbound calls
confirm that outbound calling is enabled
in your room profile next we will link
our calendar system as you can see you
can link your Microsoft Exchange office
365 or Google G suite calendar for this
video we will link an office 365 account
click office 365 then choose link
account and sign in with an admin user
in your office 365 organization to
complete the setup now the calendar
system is linked I can associate the
email addresses of my office 365
resource calendars to the rooms I
defined in Alexa for business go to the
room and add the email address of your
resource calendar this completes the
calendar setup we are now asked Alexa to
join a meeting Alexa will open the
Associated calendar and look for the
meeting dial and name for me
when there's no scheduled meeting Alexa
will ask you for the meeting ID of your
default conferencing provider to set up
a default conferencing provider choose
conferencing in the left-side navigation
and then click Add provider as you can
see Alexa for business has the most
popular conferencing providers already
available if your home franciene
provider is not listed you can choose
custom conferencing provider for this
video we will set up Amazon chime as our
conferencing provider choose Amazon
chime from the drop-down and choose add
confirm the settings in the details page
and click Add when you now ask Alexa to
join your meeting and there's no
scheduled meeting on the telander it
will now prompt you for your Amazon
chime meeting ID this completes our
setup you can also use Alexa for
business to control your existing video
conferencing equipment including cisco
telepresence polycomb and Crestron for
more information and to get started with
Alexa for business visit aws.amazon.com
slash Alexa for business thank you for
watching
[Music]
you
